description: This file is a shell script used for managing GRE tunnel interfaces, configuring network bridges, and handling system events related to hotspot tunnels. It includes functions for initializing parameters, creating tunnels, updating sys events, and setting firewall rules.

methods.name: init_snooper_sysevents
methods.description: Enables snooper logs by setting system event flags.

methods.name: read_init_params
methods.description: Retrieves initial configuration parameters from PSM database and environment files.

methods.name: create_tunnel
methods.description: Sets up GRE tunnel interfaces, virtual network configurations, and bridge interfaces.

methods.name: init_keepalive_sysevents
methods.description: Initializes keep-alive related system events and configurations.

methods.name: update_bridge_config
methods.description: Configures iptables rules for network traffic filtering related to hotspot tunnels.
